title: [Basilica Platform, Second Level]
description: The irregular shadows of night darkened ruins spread out to the west of the pyramid.  Wide stone steps lead down to the streets below. Another set of steps lead up to the third level of the pyramid.

To the west of the pyramid, a long straight road running between a series of massive statues leads to the city walls.  Wide stone steps drop down to the platform below. Another set of steps climb up to the third story of the pyramid.
